class_notes: The aim of this course is to provide a comprehensive understanding of the etiology and treatment of childhood psychopathology based on scientific study and investigation. This course will include 1) An overview of paradigms and research in abnormal child psychology 2) Attention to the context of development, and the role of development in assessing childhood psychopathology and 3) treatment strategies in abnormal psychology, and their application to specific childhood psychological disorders with attention to cross cultural influences.
course_description: Description, classification, causal factors, and treatment approaches of abnormal behavior in children and adolescents.
sections: Class Nbr: 6009, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: E. Johnson, Status: Open
